name: Vladyslav K.
about_text1: I’m a passionate frontend developer who loves creating modern, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
about_text2: I focus on clean architecture, reusable components, and smooth user experience.
about_text3: Currently seeking a position where I can grow as a React developer and contribute to a great product team.
projects_happy: Happy Хвіст — a full-stack pet adoption website built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes user authentication, reviews, filtering, and a fully responsive interface. Designed and developed from scratch, including custom UI/UX.
projects_beer: Beer House — a simple, responsive landing page showcasing adaptive layout and clean design principles.
projects_movie: Movie Explorer — a React app for browsing trending movies using TheMovieDB API. Includes detailed pages for movies, cast, info, reviews, and search functionality.
